original_text: and begins to beat his fellow servants and eats and drinks with drunkards,
korean_text: 동료들을 때리며 술친구들과 더불어 먹고 마시게 되면

sentences.original_text: and begins to beat his fellow servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 동료 종들을 때리기 시작하고

sentences.original_text: and eats and drinks with drunkards,
sentences.korean_translation: 술 취한 자들과 함께 먹고 마시며,
